titleStmt.title: The happiness of good men after death a sermon at the funeral of Mr. Robert Castell, late of Deptford in Kent, preached in the parish church of Deptford, August the 19th, 1698 : published at the request of the relations and executors of the deceased / by George Stanhope ...
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, George, 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
